title: Looking for ranked players to join a team
body:
Basically this is a thread to persuade whoever is reading this right now at this point in time to think about joining the team i have established, consists of myself (adc) and a friend of mine (mid), looking for players who main these roles and are efficient in them, Support > Jungle > Top. must be older than 16 (i have problems with people who are younger than that age) must have skype & teamspeak, are willing to invest time into the team and preferably gold - plat elo, really don't want to waste time on people who will come and then leave after a short period of time because they don't like what they see (have had it numerous times before) if you're wanting to join, pm me in game (OCE) wako487. ALL are welcome to come try for our team.

Quick note, Thought i'd leave mine and my friends elo in here for those of you who want to know, I'm Gold 5, my friend is unranked.

If you can't get a hold of me in game, add my skype - wako487/wombat.

Cheers for reading.

replies.body:
Hi. I added you. my name is PatikkStar.
I am only bronze but I want to improve and play with the same group of people consistently! I usually adc but as you are already adc my secondary role would be top. Anyway feel free to get in touch with me :)
added you on league, most likely just play with you in norms for shits n giggles
